name.str: Retrieve morphine for the Gallian Doctor

description: Retrieve three morphine units for the Gallian Doctor.

dialogue.describe: I need morphine to make things easier for me as a doctor. There's a war on, you know.
dialogue.offer: The attacks by the Imperial forces in our region have only grown worse in recent weeks. Medical supplies are stretched thin beyond what I can tolerate. I would greatly appreciate if somebody could go out and find medical equipment for me.
dialogue.accepted: This is wonderful news, you don't know how much this means to me!
dialogue.rejected: Do you have any better ideas?
dialogue.advice: Look around at a hospital, or perhaps an Imperial military outpost if you're brave enough.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found what I requested yet?
dialogue.success: This is amazing work, you have done the Gallian military a great service today!
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate, I guess the wounded will have to make do with what they have for now.
